/*
required no. of triplet is total- 1 edge connectivity triplet - 2 edge connectivity triplet
*/
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
LL ctr[100005];

int main()
{
    LL n;
    scanf("%lld", &n);
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        int u, v;
        scanf("%d %d", &u, &v);
        ctr[u]++;
        ctr[v]++;
    }
    LL ans=(n*(n-1)*(n-2))/6;
    ans-=((n-1)*(n-2));
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        if(ctr[i]>=2)
            ans+=((ctr[i]*(ctr[i]-1))/2);
    }
    printf("%lld", ans);
}
